title: How to Use Plus Addressing in Gmail

steps.title: Go to the external site you want to sign up for e.g.
steps.content: Go to the external site you want to sign up for e.g. Facebook, Myspace, eBay or Amazon.

steps.title: When asked to enter your e-mail address, add a suffix of a plus sign and the name of the service.
steps.content: When asked to enter your e-mail address, add a suffix of a plus sign and the name of the service. Add this to the end of your name, but before the @ sign. For example: JoeSmith+Facebook@gmail.com

steps.title: Create a filter and enter the same e-mail address you just used in the "To:"
steps.content: Create a filter and enter the same e-mail address you just used in the "To:" field.

steps.title: Choose to label all messages sent to that address.
steps.content: Choose to label all messages sent to that address. If you notice spam emails going to that folder, merely change the filter to delete incoming emails from that address.
